name: Browser Console AI
shortDescription: Debug faster with AI. Connect your browser console directly to Claude and other AI assistants.
description:
Browser Console AI revolutionizes web development debugging by connecting your browser's developer console directly to AI assistants like Claude Code. No more copy-pasting error logs - your AI sees exactly what's in your console in real-time.

KEY FEATURES:

✓ Automatic Log Capture - Every console.log, error, and warning is automatically captured and sent to your AI assistant

✓ Real-Time Analysis - Your AI analyzes errors as they happen, providing instant debugging suggestions

✓ 100% Private & Local - Everything runs on your machine. Your code never leaves your browser

✓ Zero Configuration - Install and use immediately. No complex setup or API keys needed

✓ Smart Filters - Search and filter logs by type, URL, timestamp, and more

✓ MCP Protocol - Works with Claude Code and any MCP-compatible AI assistant

PERFECT FOR:
- React, Vue, Angular, and any web framework
- Debugging with AI assistants
- Faster error resolution
- Team collaboration and knowledge sharing
- QA testing and bug reporting

HOW IT WORKS:
1. Install Browser Console AI from Chrome Web Store
2. Configure it with your AI assistant (Claude, etc.)
3. Start coding - console logs flow automatically to your AI
4. Get instant debugging suggestions and fixes

OPEN SOURCE:
Browser Console AI is completely open source. View and contribute on GitHub.

PRIVACY FIRST:
We don't collect any data. All logs stay on your machine unless you explicitly configure otherwise.
